title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements for the FusionReactorOptimizer system. Conduct research on fusion reactor design and operation, gather input from subject matter experts, and document functional and non-functional requirements.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall architecture of the FusionReactorOptimizer system, including components, data flows, and integration points. Define the AI models, optimization algorithms, simulation frameworks, and data pipelines to be used, considering scalability, fault tolerance, and security aspects. Outline the deployment strategy and infrastructure requirements, focusing on distributed computing and real-time data processing. Include a detailed plan for the development of modular and extensible components that can be easily maintained and updated. Also, consider the integration with existing fusion reactor simulation tools and databases.

title: Data Acquisition and Preprocessing
description: Identify and acquire relevant data sources for fusion reactor design and operation, such as experimental data, simulations, and expert knowledge. Develop data preprocessing pipelines to clean, transform, and prepare the data for model training and optimization.

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train AI models for fusion reactor design optimization, including machine learning models for parameter tuning, reinforcement learning agents for control systems, and physics-informed neural networks for simulations.

title: Optimization and Simulation Framework
description: Implement a framework for running optimization algorithms and simulations, integrating the AI models and leveraging high-performance computing resources. Develop interfaces for visualizing and analyzing optimization results.
